channel.title: Sound Design on Sébastien Villers
channel.description: Recent content in Sound Design on Sébastien Villers

item.title: Soko-Garden
item.author: sebastienvillerspro@gmail.com (Sébastien Villers)
item.description: Make your flowers grow and create a beautiful garden in this Sokoban-inspired game.

item.title: Alazia
item.author: sebastienvillerspro@gmail.com (Sébastien Villers)
item.description: Alazia is a light-hearted adventure game inspired by cosy games, but with a twist: the dissonance between comfort and uneasiness.

item.title: Elf'Intration
item.author: sebastienvillerspro@gmail.com (Sébastien Villers)
item.description: Play as one of Santa’s mischievous elves, seeking revenge by ruining the holiday for the children. Sneak into the house, steal the presents, avoid waking the parents, and don’t get caught by the dog guarding the home.

item.title: Insomaniac
item.author: sebastienvillerspro@gmail.com (Sébastien Villers)
item.description: You’re a vampire, just trying to get some sleep but pesky kids won’t leave you alone! Hunt them down, kill them and go back to your coffin.

item.title: Candle Ring
item.author: sebastienvillerspro@gmail.com (Sébastien Villers)
item.description: Play as a tiny candle on a mission: light the fire! Switch between different candle bodies — light or strong — each offering unique abilities to reach your goal.
